definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: If there is a dietician guides you to improve your diet habit, would it be healthier than before?
sentences.chinese: 如果有營養師指導你的飲食，會否對你的健康有幫助？

sentences.english: Many nutritionists agree that the breast enhancement effects of fermented rice.
sentences.chinese: 許多營養師也認同酒釀的豐胸效果。

sentences.english: Regardless of which artificial sweeteners you elect to use, consult with your doctor or dietitian first.
sentences.chinese: 不管您選擇使用人工甘味其中，同你的醫生或營養師。

sentences.english: Talk to your dietitian about other lactose-reduced products.
sentences.chinese: 向你的營養師其他的一些乳糖較少的產品。

sentences.english: Quite controversial if you’re a certified nutritionist.
sentences.chinese: 你若是個持證營養師那對此會很有爭議。

sentences.english: So, the anxiety of the nutritionists is unwarranted.
sentences.chinese: 因此，營養師的焦慮是毫無根據的。

sentences.english: are useful methods of gaining a degree as a Dietician.
sentences.chinese: 通過衛生信息學校取得營養師資格證是個不錯的方法。

sentences.english: Dieticians welcomed the move away from faddy eating habits.
sentences.chinese: 營養師歡迎這個遠離流行飲食習慣的舉動。

sentences.english: I'm studying to be a dietician.
sentences.chinese: 我正在學習是一種營養師。

sentences.english: You should be referred to a dietician for advice on diet.
sentences.chinese: 你應該轉介到營養師的意見的飲食習慣。

sentences.english: For personalized advice, talk with your doctor or a dietitian.
sentences.chinese: 向你的醫生或營養師諮詢個性化建議。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
to nurse one's health/to recuperate/to take care of/to look after/to discipline/to educate/to train/to prepare food/(dialect) to make fun of/(medicine) to opsonize
